titleStmt.title: SII 12.195: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 195. (A.R. No. 465 of 1921). IN THE SAME GŌPURA, LEFT OF ENTRANCE.

summary.p: This inscription, also dated in the 16th year, registers a similar gift of 32 cows and 1 bull by Śōlaikkōṉ Allāḷaṉ alias Tyāgavinōdaṉ to the same god for the same purpose.
The astronomical details given point to A.D. 1258, March 11, Monday, as the date of the record.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu
patiṉāṟāvatu miṉanāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣa ttu pañcami yum tiṅkaṭkiḻamaiyum pe
ṟṟa kārttikai ṉāḷ Irācarācavaḷanāṭṭu tirumuṉaippāṭit tiruveṇṇainallūr
nāṭṭu brahmade yan tiruveṇṇainallūr Uṭaiyār Āṭkoṇṭatevaṟku colai
kkoṉ Allāḷaṉāṉa tiyākavinotaṉ pālāṭiyaruḷa viṭṭa pacu muppattiraṇṭu
ṛṣabham Oṉṟum Iṉṉāyanār curapimaṉṟāṭikaḷil celvan tirucciṟṟampalakkon
kaikkoṇṭu Āṭiyaruḷa Arumoḻitevaṉāḻiyā laḷakkum pāl Eṭṭu nāḻi .
yitu cantirātittavarai cellakkaṭavatāka . Itu panmā heśvara rakṣai
Digital edition of SII 12.195 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
